name: Trisha Woodward
text: Not bad for a quick bite after shopping. Lunch special pretty fairly priced. Friendly staff. Only issue we had was the limited choice of beverages because their fountain seemed to either be having issues or was simply out of syrup for at least three of the flavors represented.
